# PRIVACY POLICY

### Welcome to FullPriceSucks

This Privacy Policy outlines how we, FullPriceSucks ("we" or "our"), collect,
use, maintain, and disclose information obtained from users ("you") of our
website fullprice.sucks ("Site") and our mobile application, as well as all
products and services offered by FullPriceSucks ("Services").

### Personal Information

We may collect your Personal Information through various means, such as when
you visit our Site, register on the Site, place an order, and engage in other
activities, services, features, or resources provided on our Site or
Application.

We do not collect or process Personal Information related to race
or ethnicity, political opinions, religious or philosophical beliefs, trade
union membership, physical or mental health, sexual life, any actual or
alleged criminal offenses or penalties, or any other information that may be
considered sensitive under the EU General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR").

### Non-personal Information

When you interact with our Site, we may collect non-personal information,
which may include browser name, language preferences, device type, settings
and software used, computer type, technical information about your connection
to our Site (such as operating system and internet service provider), and
other similar data.

We may also use device identifiers, cookies, and other
technologies on devices, applications, and web pages to collect browsing,
usage, or other technical information for fraud prevention purposes.

### Information Collection Sources

We collect information about you from various sources, including but not
limited to: When you provide information to us through our Services, such as
during registration or account creation, subscription purchases, surveys,
contact via email or other means, or by providing your business card.

Information automatically received and
stored when you use our Services.

Like many websites, we use cookies and other
unique identifiers to obtain certain types of information when your web
browser or device accesses our Services and other content served by or on
behalf of FullPriceSucks on other websites or applications.

Information
obtained from third parties, such as offline channels (telephone or direct
mail efforts), customers, vendors, suppliers, publicly-available sources,
third-party affiliate network operators, referral sources, and social network
sites or services.

If you use third-party connections or log-in to access our
Services, create a membership or profile, or access our content on third-party
platforms or services, we may also receive information available about you or
collected from you on those services.

To personalize user experience: We may aggregate
information to understand how our users interact with our Services.

Fraud Prevention and Credit Risks:
We process personal information to prevent and detect fraud and abuse,
protecting our customers' security, and assessing and managing credit risks.

Google Analytics and Clicky: Our
website and mobile application uses Google Analytics and Clicky to analyze
user interactions.

MailChimp may
obtain non-personal information like email addresses, IP addresses, language
preferences, device types, and locations.

We maintain physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards in connection
with the collection, storage, and disclosure of personal customer information.

### User Choices

If you have questions or objections regarding how we collect and process your
personal information, please contact us.

Cookies are placed on User's hard
drive for record-keeping and to track information about them.
sharing:
Please note that any Personal Information, such as your email address, will
not be shared with Listing Owners.

If you follow any FullPriceSucks
listing owners, they will have access to your Avatar, user name, and the time
you created your FullPriceSucks account.

To process payments: We use personal information provided during order
placement only to provide the service and do not share it with outside parties
except when necessary for service provision.

### Information Sharing

We do not sell, rent, or disclose your personal information to third parties
for marketing and advertising purposes without your consent.

We limit the
disclosure of personal information to what is directly relevant and necessary
for specified purposes.

We share your data only with the following parties:
Business partners: We may share your personal information with business
partners for providing Services to you.

We strive not to share personally
identifiable information with Google Analytics and Clicky.

MailChimp: If you
subscribe to the FullPriceSucks newsletter service, we use MailChimp as a
third-party service to manage subscriptions and send emails.

If you object to this disclosure to
MailChimp, you cannot use the service.

Google and Facebook: FullPriceSucks may
have third-party login interfaces for FullPriceSucks on Google or Facebook,
but we only receive feedback on whether the login is successful, and we do not
provide your personal information to these third parties.

Help Scout: If you
use the Contact Us feature on the Site to ask for our help, we may share your
email address and name with Help Scout to reply to you.

Customer information is typically one of the transferred business assets but
remains subject to pre-existing Privacy Policy commitments (unless the
customer consents otherwise).

If FullPriceSucks's owner or substantially all
of its assets are acquired, customer information will be one of the
transferred assets.

Other third parties: We may share personal information
with legal and regulatory authorities upon request, outside professional
advisors (e.g., accountants, auditors, lawyers) under binding contractual
obligations of confidentiality, relevant parties, law enforcement agencies or
courts as necessary for legal rights establishment, exercise, or defense, and
for prevention, investigation, detection, prosecution of criminal offenses,
safeguarding public security, or as required by applicable law.

### International Transfers of Information

We may transfer your Personal Information to recipients in other countries.

We maintain physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards in connection
with the collection, storage, and disclosure of personal customer information.
